Feeding Big Brother till we die - http://monki.biz/1u | Kabads - musings, mutterings and murmerings

Feeding Big Brother till we die - http://monki.biz/1u

This article http://monki.biz/1u describes how we are feeding the big brother of the future. Interesting idea - and we are doing it willingly with the thoughts that it is more beneficial. Will this change? I doubt it - as long as people are kept in the dark about the business model and just sold the idea of sharing, I think it will succeed  - but when will the boundaries be set? When will medical healthcare be withdrawn because a lifestyle that is portrayed online doesn't fit the medical model? Then, people may think twice, but obviously, that's too late.
